new__paragraph-1.message: At Adblock Plus, we aim to continue to provide functionality that makes your internet browsing experience better. Here are a few things we think you’ll love:

new__item-1__paragraph-1.message: We’ve added more functionality to continue to block annoying ads and pop-ups while you browse on social media or your favorite news site.

new__item-2__heading.message: Now available! See fewer anti-adblock walls (Premium)

new__item-2__paragraph-1.message: With more sites asking you to turn off your ad blocker, we’ve added a new feature that helps you see less of these pop-ups! With Adblock Plus Premium, you can enjoy the content that you want, while still blocking annoying ads.

new__item-3__paragraph-1.message: Coming soon! A new Adblock Plus Premium feature will allow you to hide cookie consent banners on the websites you visit.

new__paragraph-3.message: Need to report an issue? Reach out to us via social media, email or the user forum.
